meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be removed.
meanings.sent1: The removabilities of stickers make them easy to peel off.
meanings.sent2: The removabilities of stains from the carpet depend on the cleaning solution used.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the removabilities of objects disappearing and reappearing.
meanings.sent4: The removabilities of obstacles in her path allowed her to reach her goal effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The removabilities of the paint from the wall revealed a hidden message underneath.
